documentation.text:
@dev Implementation of the TRC3156 Flash loans extension, as defined in
 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3156[TRC-3156].
 Adds the {flashLoan} method, which provides flash loan support at the token
 level. By default there is no fee, but this can be changed by overriding {flashFee}.
 _Available since v4.1._

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TRC20FlashMint: allowance does not allow refund"

arguments.value: TRC20FlashMint: allowance does not allow refund

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TRC20FlashMint: allowance does not allow refund"
